Overview

Elang API to CouchDb

Copyright © 2008 Vitor Rodrigues

Version: Apr 11 2008 00:08:38

Authors: Vitor Rodrigues (vitor@tarpipe.com).

eCouch is an Erlang application that provides access to CouchDb servers.

It uses the rfc4627 module from LShift The design was inspired in the article Building a Non-blocking TCP server using OTP principles and assumes that inets application is running.
